citation: Ark. Code Ann. ยง 25-10-129(b) (DHS authorized/directed to promulgate rules necessary to conform DHS programs to federal law to receive federal funds).
administering_body: Arkansas Department of Human Services (DHS) and its divisions (including DMS and DAABHS/OSAMH)
governs: Rulemaking to conform DHS-administered or DHS-funded programs to federal statutes, rules, and regulations
Federal funding compliance for DHS programs
